Detailed Description

Macro Definition Documentation

#define IOCTL_BSP_VID_ENC_GET_CHIP_ID   (BSP_VID_ENC_IOCTL_BASE + 0x00U)

Get Chip ID.

This IOCTL can be used to get video encoder chip information like chip number, revision, firmware/patch revision

Parameters
cmdArgs[IN/OUT] const Bsp_VidEncChipIdParams *
cmdArgsStatus[OUT] Bsp_VidEncChipIdStatus *
Returns
FVID2_SOK on success, else failure.
#define IOCTL_BSP_VID_ENC_SET_MODE   (BSP_VID_ENC_IOCTL_BASE + 0x01U)

Configure Video mode.

This IOCTL can be used to configure encoder for mode.

Parameters
cmdArgs[IN] Bsp_VidEncConfigParams *
cmdArgsStatus[OUT] NULL
Returns
FVID2_SOK on success, else failure.
